name: Project Xenon Valkyrie+
overview: Xenon Valkyrie+ is a rogue-lite platformer game in which you must fight to the deepest part of a moon and halt the plans of a wicked witch. Obtain many weapons as you fight through a unique, randomly-generated world every time you play. Encounter many characters, hidden areas, alternative routes and enemies that all form part of a legendary story. With traditional graphics and high quality chiptune music, level up and get the amazing power of the Xenon Valkyrie! Features: • Rogue-lite platformer with a great story • Many worlds with different routes • 3 heroes with unique skills • 100+ items • Multiple bosses and enemies • RPG elements • Several endings and secrets • Quality Chiptune music • Hard gameplay and Permadeath
